name: Ray the Adventurer
description:
Ray the Adventurer - my first playable game project in Unity! 
Ray is a hungry little raccoon, so you gotta collect grapes in this tiny 3D Jump'n'Run!

This was just a ~ 5 months project with focus on learning a bit of Blender, doing a full character + rig + animations and visual scripting in Unity for the first time.
That's why it's pretty short, but it was fun to dip into level design again!

This project gave me great challenges and while it's definitely not perfect, I'm still proud of the things I achieved with this.
((also, jumping in games is so weird, it drove me crazy haha, I'd stick to walk sims for solo projects in the future))
I hope you enjoy the cute environment and have fun exploring it!!

I'm open for feedback since I'm still very new to making games! However my focus lies on game art and had to dip into tech art, level, UI and game design and scripting to fulfill this project.

HUGE thanks to Marc Davis for the music and sounds!!

Software used:
Modelling: Blender
Sculpting: ZBrush
UV Unwrap: 3Ds Max
Rigging & Character Animations: Maya
Baking: Marmoset Toolbag 4
Texturing: Substance Painter
Engine: Unity
Logo, UI & Graphics Edit: Photoshop
Video Edit: DaVinci Resolve

((Also first time creating a trailer!! was so exciting to finally try that!!))
